meanings.sent1: I always carry a flashlight when I go camping.
meanings.sent2: Can you pass me the flashlight so I can see in the dark?

meanings.definition: A sudden burst of light or flame
meanings.sent1: The fireworks created a beautiful flashlight in the night sky.
meanings.sent2: The unexpected flashlight from the explosion startled everyone.
meanings.sent3: The birthday cake's candles gave a festive flashlight when lit.
meanings.sent4: The lightning strike was like a powerful flashlight in the dark storm.
meanings.sent5: The flashlight of the camera captured the moment perfectly.
